headline: A Look at Hewlett Packard Enterprise’s Valuation After Winning $931 Million Federal Data Center Contract
summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) has secured a $931 million, 10-year contract with the Defense Information Systems Agency to overhaul key federal data centers using its GreenLake hybrid cloud platform. This significant award highlights HPE’s growing role in federal IT modernization efforts. See our latest analysis for Hewlett Packard Enterprise. HPE’s $931 million federal contract comes at a pivotal moment, with the stock building momentum on renewed confidence in its hybrid cloud strategy as...
